items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know how to pronounce my name properly.
Tom looked like he was about to jump out the window.
Tom looks a lot like his father did at the same age.
Tom loves to talk about his travels in great detail.
I haven\'t even thought about what needs to be done.
Tom certainly didn\'t intend to tell Mary the truth.
Tom probably got tired of waiting for Mary and left.
Tom put his briefcase on the floor next to his desk.
Tom reached into the sack and pulled out some coins.
I\'m not going to help you if you don\'t want me to.
